
tanhx K=8 and no of bits=8
00001111;     	//0.234375
00011110;	//0.46875
00101110;	//0.71875
00111111;	//0.984375
01010010;	//1.28125
01100111;	//1.609375
10000100;	//2.0625
11000000;	//3


tanhx k=12 and no of bits=10
10'b0000110010;	//0.1953125
10'b0001100101;	//0.39453125
10'b0010011000;	//0.59375
10'b0011001101;	//0.80078125
10'b0100000011;	//1.01171875
10'b0100111011;	//1.23046875
10'b0101110100;	//1.453125
10'b0110101111;	//1.68359375	
10'b0111101101;	//1.92578125
10'b1000110001;	//2.19140625	
10'b1010000100;	//2.515625
10'b1100000000;	//3


tanhx k=16 and no of bits=10
10'b0000101010;	//0.1640625
10'b0001010101;	//0.33203125
10'b0001111111;	//0.49609375
10'b0010101010;	//0.6640625
10'b0011010110;	//0.8359375
10'b0100000010;	//1.0078125
10'b0100101110;	//1.1796875
10'b0101011011;	//1.35546875
10'b0110001000;	//1.53125
10'b0110110101;	//1.70703125
10'b0111100011;	//1.88671875
10'b1000010010;	//2.0703125
10'b1001000011;	//2.26171875
10'b1001110111;	//2.46484375
10'b1010110010;	//2.6953125
10'b1100000000;	//3

sigmoid k=8 and no of bits=8
8'b00001110;	//0.4375
8'b00011100;	//0.875
8'b00101011;	//1.34375
8'b00111010;	//1.8125	
8'b01001011;	//2.34375
8'b01011110;	//2.9375
8'b01110110;	//3.6875
8'b10100000;	//5



sigmoid k=12 and no of bits=10
10'b0000101101;	//0.3515625
10'b0001011011;	//0.7109375	
10'b0010001001;	//1.0703125
10'b0010110111;	//1.4296875
10'b0011100110;	//1.796875
10'b0100010110;	//2.171875
10'b0101000111;	//2.5546875
10'b0101111001;	//2.9453125
10'b0110101101;	//3.3515625
10'b0111100101;	//3.7890625	
10'b1000100111;	//4.3046875
10'b1010000000;	//5


sigmoid k=16 and no of bits=10
10'b0000100101;	//0.2890625
10'b0001001010;	//0.578125
10'b0001110000;	//0.875
10'b0010010101;	//1.1640625
10'b0010111011;	//1.4609375
10'b0011100000;	//1.75
10'b0100000110;	//2.046875
10'b0100101011;	//2.3359375
10'b0101010001;	//2.6328125
10'b0101110111;	//2.9296875
10'b0110011110;	//3.234375
10'b0111000101;	//3.5390625
10'b0111101101;	//3.8515625
10'b1000010111;	//4.1796875	
10'b1001000110;	//4.546875
10'b1010000000;	//5
